document.full_text: in an attempt to bring crowds of young people back to the preakness, the maryland jockey club has named kegasus ' a half a beer-bellied man, half a horse ' lord of the infieldfest.
document.title: at preakness, not everybody's idea of fun
lines_and_colors: in an attempt to bring crowds of young people back to the preakness, the maryland jockey club has named kegasus ' a half a beer-bellied man, half a horse ' lord of the infieldfest.
